name: Mark Grasso
text: I placed an order, granted I showed up after closing by 10 minutes. I could see my order in the warmer, and the broad behind the counter refused to sell it to me. Lock the door if you're closed, and don't throw out food that is willing to be paid for. You lost a loyal customer. Bad business.

text: Didnt get a ranch cup which makes the wings useless. I tip well..trying here. :/

text: There was a problem with the order, but they made it right! We will definitely continue to order......this was our current favorite already.   I highly recommend the food and service here.  Thanks again!

text: Love the flavored crust. Garlic herb and ranch are my favorite. Hits the spot every time. Their drivers are awesome too. Normally gets here fast.

name: Brad Lockhart
text: Terrible customer service. During my last three visits I've encountered serious incompetence and lack of attention to detail. Once they gave my order to another customer. I watched them ignore my specific request for making an order with lite butter, twice. Never going back.
